meanings.sent1: The tiresomeness of the long meeting made everyone yawn.
meanings.sent2: Her constant complaints about the weather added to the tiresomeness of the situation.
meanings.sent3: The tiresomeness of waiting in line was broken by a sudden dance party.
meanings.sent4: The tiresomeness of the daily commute felt like trudging through thick mud.
meanings.sent5: The tiresomeness of the repetitive task was like a never-ending loop.

meanings.definition: The feeling of being bored or annoyed due to repetition or dullness.
meanings.sent1: The tiresomeness of the movie plot made him doze off.
meanings.sent2: She sighed at the tiresomeness of having to explain the same thing over and over.
meanings.sent3: To break the tiresomeness of the lecture, the professor told a funny joke.
meanings.sent4: The tiresomeness of the rainy days felt like a heavy weight on her shoulders.
